label: 判事
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: 1. Official of the Ministry of Justice (Kyōbushō) .Divided into Major (Daihanji ),Middle (Chūhanji ),and Minor Judges (Shōhanji ). 2. Official of the Government Headquarters in Kyūshū (Dazaifu ).Divided into Senior (Daihanji) and Junior Judges (Shōhanji ).
